content: Just finished soldering a MH-Z19B (COâ‚‚ sensor) and a WeMos D1 mini on a board, with space left for some extra sensors. ðŸ˜€ I have it all connected to my Home Assistant instance by having flashed ESPHome on the WeMos. :homeassistant: Really great stuff!
